inclusion.criterion: refractory ascites or hepatic hydrothorax and plan for TIPS placement
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: well-documented overt hepatic encephalopathy, either persistent or at the time of screening
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease and is being offered Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl. He does not have any signs of dementia.
